tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    price_date DATE,
    open_price FLOAT,
    close_price FLOAT,
    high_price FLOAT,
    low_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL,
  high_price DECIMAL,
  low_price DECIMAL,
  close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR,
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_history (
 history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 stock_id INT NOT NULL,
 price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT fk_stock_id FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES stock_price_data(stock_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
 result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 stock_id INT NOT NULL,
 analysis_result TEXT NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT fk_stock_id FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES stock_price_data(stock_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE StockDetails (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_name VARCHAR(50),
    sector VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE FirmInvestments (
    firm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    firm_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    total_assets DECIMAL(15, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentEmployees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPortfolio (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
